title: Moonlight
description: Supplier Management System enables efficient supplier tracking, order processing, and inventory management, streamlining operations and ensuring a seamless workflow.

title: Buymart
description: A user-friendly online store with secure authentication, dynamic product displays, seamless checkout, and an admin panel for efficient product and order management.

title: Event Management
description: Successfully organized and managed events, ensuring seamless coordination, effective communication, and timely execution to deliver exceptional experiences.

title: Zara Redesign
description: Redesigned Zara's website in Figma, improving navigation, homepage layout, product pages, and filters for a modern, user-friendly interface with enhanced visuals, clear CTAs, and faster load times.

title: Fruitopia
description: Fruitopia is a fun puzzle game where players swap fruits to match three or more in rows or columns. Score points and advance through levels within limited moves.
